org.apache.pig.newplan

Class PartitionFilterExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.newplan.FilterExtractor
      • org.apache.pig.newplan.PartitionFilterExtractor

  • public class PartitionFilterExtractor
extends FilterExtractor
    This is a rewrite of PColFilterExtractor Extracts partition filters for interfaces implementing LoadMetaData
